about_the_game:
Welcome to Jumper, Jumpy Time Attack Adventure !

Jumper is a 2D platformer arcade style, the goal is to stay alive as long as possible, jump on as many platforms as possible, stay as high on the screen as possible and collect bonuses as much as possible to earn more points but be careful for traps ! As the score is increasing so is the difficulty and the speed.

Future releases will include :

  • Story mode
  • Leaderboards
  • Multiplayer support

Thanks in advance for any feedback !

As the score is increasing so is the difficulty and the speed.

Thanks in advance for any feedback !

linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad advised

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 13, 14
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 13, 14
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad advised

name: Jumper, Jumpy Time Attack Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel i3, 1GHz
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Xe
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 Quad Core, 2GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Xe
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad advised
